But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

Albert Uy is on the verge of an amazing discovery in the Solomon Islands, but there's a threat looming on the horizon.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali, the greatest fighter ever, remains a global icon. His name still commands respect. Hear from those who knew him, relive his legendary fights, and explore the life of boxing’s greatest symbol.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao: Unstoppable Force
programme.desc: This is the remarkable journey of one of boxing’s most unstoppable forces. Manny Pacquiao’s legacy will forever be remembered for the change accomplished inside and outside the ring…

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Mena feasts with magician and Vegas legend Penn Jillette. He explores the off-strip Sin City vegan food scene, indulging in plant-based “Beef” Wellington, sky-high waffles, and intricate dim sum, then dines with cookbook author Carleigh Bodrug.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2

programme.title: America In Color S3
programme.desc: From Bonnie and Clyde to the Lindbergh kidnapping, the early 20th century was marked by celebrity outlaws, courtroom dramas, and shocking murders. Look back at these high-profile criminal cases in rare home movies, newsreel coverage, and FBI films.

programme.title: America In Color S3
programme.desc: Take a full-colour look at the charms and challenges of small town life during the first half of the 20th century. The myth of these quaint, harmonious communities lives on, but by the 1960s many Americans had left to escape poverty and prejudice.

programme.title: The Codebreaker Who Hacked Hitler
programme.desc: Gordon Welchman was a British codebreaker who played a crucial role in undermining Nazi communications in WWII. Discover how Welchman’s top-secret work has impacted modern surveillance and codebreaking.

programme.title: The Story Of Playstation
programme.desc: With video-games on the rise, Sony, the tech superpower would attempt a collaboration with Nintendo. After a shocking betrayal, Sony founded what would become the world’s most successful chain of video game consoles. The Playstation was here to stay.

programme.title: Gameplay: The Story Of The Videogame Revolution
programme.desc: Gameplay is a feature on the history of videogames. From Pong to Pac Man, Super Mario to Lara Croft, Doom, Grand Theft Auto and beyond, we chronicle the remarkable story of the fastest evolving new media of all time.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control"… or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.desc: Clover's wild, party-girl twin sister Crimson visits and King Julien is instantly smitten.

programme.desc: Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rover’s number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator who rose up from his beginnings as a slave races against time in order to rescue his beloved before an erupted volcano destroys the whole city.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Chappie

programme.title: Star Trek: Generations

programme.title: Days Of Thunder

programme.title: The Patriot

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is just your average, undercover super-assassin. When he meets Jen, he finds true love. But a picture-perfect marriage will not save Spencer from becoming a target himself. Now Spencer and Jen are on the run for their lives.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: Extreme sports athlete Xander Cage (Triple X) is recruited by the government to infiltrate a Russian crime ring led by Yorgi, sparking a high-stakes adventure across Europe.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: The Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Phi, a veteran boxer, sets out on a quest for revenge after the ruthless crime lord Ba Rau killed his wife. His journey takes him into the remote village near Foggy Mountain, where he discovers Ba Rau's human trafficking activities. The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wife’s death.

programme.title: Dachimawa Lee: Gangnam Spy
programme.desc: Legendary Korean spy Dachimawa Lee is assigned to recover the stolen national treasure, a Golden Buddha, and reveal the dark plot. However, his mission ends in failure and Agent Lee must now face off the mysterious mastermind on the snowy slopes of Switzerland, where the statue is believed to be hidden.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey

As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Final Answer
programme.desc: Nino is a self-starter who now lives a comfortable life. Meanwhile, Joanna is a cheerful person who has made a career out of joining all sorts of contests. When Joanna applied as Nino's assistant, he noticed the luck Joanna brought him so he decided to hire her.

programme.title: Amnesia Love
programme.desc: A gay guy meets an accident and gets washed up in a remote island. When he wakes up he doesn't remember anything, including his gender orientation. After developing a romance with a barrio lady, things get crazy when his boyfriend is able to locate him.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Two of Us
programme.desc: The story of two people who find each other while trying to make a living in a foreign country. But as time passes, underneath the sweet moments lie a toxic relationship that sparks violent tendencies.

programme.title: Banyo Queen
programme.desc: Angelie (Rica Peralejo) comes from a family of sorceress. As a tradition, everyone should have a virgin sacrifice before their 18th birthday to escape the curse. With the help of her Aunt Chada (Mystica), she hunts a virgin to stay alive.

programme.title: Pag Oras Mo, Oras Mo Na
programme.desc: Action superstar, Phillip Salvador stars as a dedicated policeman who resorts to alcohol in this intense ,action packed movie.

programme.title: Tuloy, Bukas ang Pinto
programme.desc: They are long-lost cousins who grew up in different places and in different ways. When they all finally find themselves gathered at the imposing house of the grandmother, tension builds as they wait for the lawyer who holds their grandmother’s will.

programme.title: Upline Downline
programme.desc: A young man struggling to support his family enters the world of multilevel marketing.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel (Joem Bascon) and Cynthia (Mercedes Cabral), a young couple with a child on the way, head back to Baguio to start over again. Everything seems to be falling into place for them - or so they think - until strange things start to happen in their house.

programme.title: Two of Us
programme.desc: The story of two people who find each other while trying to make a living in a foreign country. But as time passes, underneath the sweet moments lie a toxic relationship that sparks violent tendencies.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Jowable
programme.desc: Jowable follows the story of Elsa (Kim Molina), no boyfriend since birth as she embarks on finding her one true love. It becomes a question whether an actual future jowa is out there waiting for her.

programme.title: Bukas na Lang Kita Mamahalin
programme.desc: Angelu de Leon and Diether Ocampo team up for the first time in this witty, heart-warming story that explores the ups and downs of romance in the 21st century.

programme.title: Finally Found Someone
programme.desc: Aprilyn who is left by his groom on the day of their wedding becomes viral online. Devastated, she meets Raffy who works at a PR agency hired by the father of the groom who will help her move on.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E05 - First Do No Harm
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E06 - The Secret Admirer
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: CSI S4 E16 - Getting Off
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: A cartoon studio creates one of the most recognisable characters in the world. Mickey Mouse begins as a pencil sketch, and through a journey of failure, innovation, and guts becomes an American icon.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The Alaskan wilderness is known for mysterious disappearances, stories of strange creatures, and is a hotspot for UFO sightings. Could Alaska's mysteries be due to a presence that is not of this world?

programme.desc: The team unveils the greatest mysteries of the Bermuda Triangle: its most perplexing vanished ships and planes, and the strange and powerful forces said to be behind the Triangle's deadly reputation.

programme.title: Ma'am, May We Go Out (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey were lazy bums who would inherit a fortune if they would be able to graduate from high school. It was not easy but it helped that the P.E. teacher is Carmi Martin.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Kung Kasalanan Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Irma was the innocent wife, who was caught in a web of evil spunned by the people she loved. Confused, alone and penniless, she had only Mike to turn to. That is if he would believe her.

programme.title: Bahala Na VS Sputnik
programme.desc: "Bahala na" and "Sigue-Sigue Sputnik" are two of the most wanted gangs decades ago. They fought more than any other notorious criminals. They fear no law and life for them is a life of violence. They have no Lords other than their brotherhood until their world self-destructed.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Tiger Commando
programme.desc: Tiger Commando

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Pulis Probinsya (Pat. Omar Abdullah)
programme.desc: A cop from the province gets a new assignment in the big city. He was disappointed to find out that he would be living and working in a different turf where the games played are almost always deadly.

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Contreras Gang

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DESIGN X STORIES
programme.desc: Today's theme: Learning through Play. In a complex, unpredictable world, the way children play can teach us a lot. Explore the world of playground and game designs that help us learn through play.

programme.title: Viewpoint Science
programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations!

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN: Sado Island
programme.desc: Much of Japan's famous gold was mined on Sado, immense riches giving rise to cultural traditions like the islanders' love of Noh theater. Sado's natural wonders include the once-extinct crested ibis.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 6
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Sal, and Q get in a pickle serving up humiliating tasks as deli waiters, and later they step behind the counter asking customers to settle a series of silly debates. Plus tonight's big loser gets burned during an embarrassing toast that leaves everyone speechless.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 7
programme.desc: The guys are forced to look for love in all the wrong places at a singles' event, and then phone it in making embarrassing calls on strangers' cells. And there's no happily-ever-after for tonight's big loser when his storybook ending becomes a humiliating sob story.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 8
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr head to the Lone Star State in a special episode that proves even embarrassment is bigger in Texas. The city boys from New York whip up trouble teaching cowboy skills on a ranch, and forget their southern hospitality trying to sell western wear. And it's a real drag for tonight's loser at what is definitely his first rodeo.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 10
programme.desc: The guys give a taste of their awkward customer service at a liquor store, take tickets of humiliation at a deli counter, and try to get signatures to recognize phony holidays. And tonight's losers pay a frigid price in a coldhearted double punishment.

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars in Semi-Pro, an outrageous comedy set in 1976 against the backdrop of the maverick ABA a wild and crazy basketball league that attempted to rival the NBA.

programme.title: Clash Of The Titans
programme.desc: In CLASH OF THE TITANS, the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Sam Worthington (Terminator Salvation, Avatar) stars as the Greek hero Perseus in this spectacular retelling of the classic myth (and '80s cult classic film). Born of a god, but raised as a man, Perseus is helpless to save his family from the clutches of Hades (Oscar nominee Ralph Fiennes -- Harry Potter films), the vengeful god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, he volunteers to lead a dangerous mission to defeat Hades before he can seize power from Zeus (Oscar nominee Liam Neeson -- Batman Begins) and unleash hell on earth. With a daring band of warriors, Perseus sets off on a perilous journey deep into forbidden worlds. Battling unholy demons and fearsome beasts, he will triumph only if he can accept his power as a god, defy his fate and create his own destiny.

programme.title: Interview With The Vampire
programme.desc: A 200-year-old vampire tells history to a young reporter, weaving the history that has come to be known as Interview with The Vampire.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 12
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to win a locker packed with recreational equipment and what looks like a hidden tractor. But when the dust settles and the cover's pulled back, one lucky hunter gets the surprise of a lifetime.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 13
programme.desc: Our buyers are in for the fight of their lives as they lock horns at the nation's biggest shipping container auction. This day's competition is not for the faint of heart. With skyrocketing bids and unprecedented merchandise, it's a gambler's dream come true. But at the end of the day, one buyer will be crowned with a six-figure payday while another will be sent home broken in two.

programme.title: Friends S5 23

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 1
programme.desc: Newbies Scott and Chrissy push their way onto Brandon and Lori's turf forcing the couple to burn cash like never before. Then, a set of wrapped pallets heats up the competition, forcing everyone to fight to the finish for what could be nothing morethan hidden garbage. And later, the bidding explodes over a large mystery item. And when the dust settles, two lucky storage warriors unveil the most explosive treasure to date.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 2
programme.desc: Arch-enemies drop their guard to team up against a new threat. Then, it's back to the future when Desert Dan risks all on a tire and a hunch. And later, blades are drawn, fragile alliances crumble, and the buyers let nothing stand in the way of winning big.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 7
programme.desc: In Vegas, an old rivalry resurfaces. Then, a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car, but when the bidding ends will the buyer drive away with a fortune or stall out in failure? And later, it's every man for himself when a unit full of gemstones ignites an all out war among the competition.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 8

programme.desc: Newbies Scott and Chrissy push their way onto Brandon and Lori's turf forcing the couple to burn cash like never before. Then, a set of wrapped pallets heats up the competition, forcing everyone to fight to the finish for what could be nothing morethan hidden garbage. And later, the bidding explodes over a large mystery item. And when the dust settles, two lucky storage warriors unveil the most explosive treasure to date.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 2
programme.desc: Arch-enemies drop their guard to team up against a new threat. Then, it's back to the future when Desert Dan risks all on a tire and a hunch. And later, blades are drawn, fragile alliances crumble, and the buyers let nothing stand in the way of winning big.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 7
programme.desc: In Vegas, an old rivalry resurfaces. Then, a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car, but when the bidding ends will the buyer drive away with a fortune or stall out in failure? And later, it's every man for himself when a unit full of gemstones ignites an all out war among the competition.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 8
programme.desc: A mega-find leaves the winning bidder scratching his head, but when the true nature of this item is revealed he'll be swimming in more than just cash. Then, the gloves come off when T-Money scrambles to scoop up a locker filled with vintage bar equipment. And later, Scott spots something he hopes no one else sees. If his secret stays safe, he could quadruple his profit.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 6
programme.desc: Luthor plans to move LuthorCorp to Smallville, but finds opposition in Lana. Sarah faces a difficult decision, and Clark confronts Luthor face-to-face.

programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 165
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News Victoria brings you the day's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn (Sun-Thu) and Iskhandar Razak (Fri-Sat).

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 14 - North Melbourne v Fremantle
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 2
programme.desc: Roads Unknown: India follows Australian adventure riding pioneer Jess Zahra, as she embarks on an unforgettable 5000km motorbike quest across India, unveiling the country's scenic landscapes and cultural richness.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Fitzroy Crossing, Bellenden Ker, Inverloch
programme.desc: Ernie cruises the ancient waterways of Danggu Gorge, Aaron catches up with a talented woodcarver in Queensland's sugarcane country and Narelda tries her hand at natural horsemanship in regional Victoria.

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 21
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition - Episode 18
programme.desc: From trade and tariffs; to the G7, China, Russia, Gaza, Iran and Ukraine; the border and deportations; the One Big Beautiful bill and DOGE to 'Making America Healthy Again' - Chas and John unpack the week in Trumpland.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 22
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food - Episode 2
programme.desc: Chef Khanh Ong journeys to the coastal town of Port Lincoln in South Australia to unlock the secrets of the local seafood. Khanh learns how to trawl for wild prawns, harvest oysters and forages for unique coastal ingredients.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 2
programme.desc: Roads Unknown: India follows Australian adventure riding pioneer Jess Zahra, as she embarks on an unforgettable 5000km motorbike quest across India, unveiling the country's scenic landscapes and cultural richness.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Mystery Sphinx
programme.desc: Marc Fennell takes us to Egypt, a remote Canadian island and London in a quest to unravel the mystery of a sphinx located in the British Museum that looks almost identical to those from Egypt - except it isn't. (Final)

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia - 1980: Barry Humphries, Little River Band, Carol Raye
programme.desc: Michael Parkinson interviews guests Barry Humphries, Little River Band with Glenn Shorrock and Carol Raye.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Gabriele Visentin - European Union Ambassador to Australia
programme.desc: His Excellency Mr Gabriele Visentin, European Union Ambassador to Australia, addresses the National Press Club of Australia on the topic "The EU as a Power for Prosperity, Security and Democracy Worldwide".

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 22
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: The Role Of A Lifetime - Episode 3
programme.desc: This genre-bending series tackles some of the biggest problems facing Australian families today. From teens' sometimes-fraught search to find their tribe, to the all-pervasive effect of social media on children.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Andrew Thornhill
programme.desc: We meet a motivated moss expert dedicated to protecting and discovering the microscopic underworld of the plants beneath our feet.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 24
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you an engaging mix of the latest news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 24
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 20
programme.desc: Australians have had their say at the election and now we have a 48th Federal Parliament. How will a re-elected Anthony Albanese use his mandate? How can Sussan Ley, David Littleproud and Larissa Waters rebuild their parties?

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 19
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel discuss Australia v South Africa in Cricket's World Test Championship Final, NSW will take a 1-0 series lead into State of Origin Game 2 in Perth, plus AFL, Super Rugby Semi-Finals and Super Netball.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 17
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who appeared on News Breakfast. Plus film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Jocelyn, 29, dreams of being Insta-famous. Her family ignores her online addiction, leaving Jocelyn at risk. Nicholas will stop at nothing to achieve his dream of becoming a respected content creator.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie has collected items from thrift stores and estate sales over the years for various projects, which has led to a massive amount of clutter in her home, making living in the space very difficult.

programme.desc: A teen gets nabbed for being in the wrong place at the wrong time, while a man who left town with a warrant gets caught when he returns for his aunt's funeral and faces a one million dollar bail.

programme.desc: A suspect loses his cool in the interrogation room; a man with a shocking gunshot wound leaves police with more questions than answers; a game of hide and seek turns deadly; and more.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. These videos also discuss children's ability to take care of oneself and understating the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinuturo ang tungkol sa pagbabay, panghalip, pangngalan, at salitang naglalarawan. Tinatalakay din dito ang tungkol sa pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures. These also talk about continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapakita ang pag- unawa sa kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran ng sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo dito na nakakatulong sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat batang mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay nagtuturo tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay. Tinatalakay din dito ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about division of whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. These also explain about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. These also talk identifying major points and key themes, and the difference between made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapakita ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-aaralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagbibigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent fractions. These also explain lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. These also talk about identifying the elements, comparing, and contrasting information from stories and how to write it. The videos also teach about words, phrases, and setences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pag- unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the motion of objects, sources and uses of light, sound, heat and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the motion of objects, sources and uses of light, sound, heat and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pang-abay, pang-uri, pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang naglalarawan. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagsulat ng pangungusap, talata, at balita. Sa mga palabas din na ipapaliwanag kung paano magsuri ng mga kuwento at mga pahayag.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about parallel and perpendicular lines, angles, triangles, and quadrilaterals. These also explain about continuous and repeating patterns and number sentences and the concept of time, perimeter, area, and volume.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: In these episodes, adverbs, signal words, and graphic organizers will be discussed. These will aslo teach how to analyze a story and how to infer the speaker's tone, mood and purpose.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito naipamamalas ang pang- unawa sa bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan sa lipunan, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng bansa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the force that can change the shape, size or movement of objects and how light, heat and sound travel using various objects.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang may lapi, at iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap. Pag-aaralan din dito ang pagbibigay ng lagom, pagsusuri ng pahayag, at pagkuha ng impormasyon sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about understanding of solid figures, sequence in forming rules, expressions and equations. These also talk about rate and speed, and of area and surface area of plane and solid or space figures.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about presenting reports on different viewpoints and evaluating narratives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-uusapan ang mas malalim na pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga suliranin, isyu at hamon ng kasarinlan.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on gravity and friction affect movement of objects and how energy is transformed in simple machines.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at paghahambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan. Pag-aaralan din dito ang tungkol sa mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, sa wastong paggamit ng impormal na komunikasyon at angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o ipinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes examines biases and propagandas. These also teach about using parallelism and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about the particle nature of matter as basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. These also talk about the identity of a substance according to its atomic structure and the periodic table of elements as an organizing tool to determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang uri ng panitikan at sa pagsusulat at pagsusuri ng mga ito. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang paggamit ng wastong mga pahayag at angkop na mga salita sa pagsusulat ng reaksiyon sa mga teksto at napanood na video.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of combinatorics and probability.
